name: indescribably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to describe, especially because of being extremely good or bad: indescribably awful The mountains are indescribably beautiful on a clear day. See
indescribable
More examplesFewer examplesThe bread is easy to make and indescribably delicious.They are happy, but almost indescribably nervous.I found the film indescribably boring.
